name: Farm Way
description:
Farm Way is a game in which the player must develop their farming business and become the best company in the world. To achieve this goal, you have to go out for harvesting that you will sell in the future and can improve your company.  

For maximum productivity on harvesting, you will need to find the optimal resource gathering strategy for yourself. Three types of resources are available to the player for extraction: watermelons, pumpkins, trees.

Remember that your competitors are awake, and if you forget about your farm for a while, they will immediately try to overtake you. However, not everyone succeeds! Therefore, you have every chance to become the best farmer!
